row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.PROMPTSET.START_EXEC
row.description: Start a Exec instance in a docker container

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Enter information to start an exec instance"><properties><entry name="text">Enter information to start an exec instance</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: UC4RB_DKR_DETACH#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="UC4RB_DKR_DETACHs.00" nl="1" text="Detach" tooltip="Detach" required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Detach</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DKR_DETACHs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Detach</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>

row.name: UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATH#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATHs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Folder path to save file" tooltip="Path where a response file will be generated and saved. Provide if save response in a file is 'YES'. If empty , response file will be written at agent's temp directory." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Folder path to save file</entry> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATHs.00</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Path where a response file will be generated and saved. Provide if save response in a file is 'YES'. If empty , response file will be written at agent's temp directory.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </text>

row.name: UC4RB_DKR_SAVE_FILE#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="UC4RB_DKR_SAVE_FILEs.00" nl="1" text="Save docker response in a file" tooltip="In case of 'YES' response will be written in a file else will be written in a job report." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Save docker response in a file</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DKR_SAVE_FILEs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">In case of 'YES' response will be written in a file else will be written in a job report.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>
